head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REISS, THERESA (TERRY), RET.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REISS, THERESA (TERRY), RET.

block.p: REISS-Theresa (Terry), Ret. Supervisor of U.S. Passport Agency in NYC. Beloved wife of the late Samuel. Cherished mother of Cookie Spancer and Martin (Lina) Reiss. Dear sister of Daniel Gelles. Also survived by four adoring and loving grandchildren and three great - grandchildren, and many nieces and nephews. Services Wednesday 11:45am at ''The Riverside,'' 76th St & Amsterdam Ave.

REISS-Theresa (Terry), Ret. Supervisor of U.S. Passport Agency in NYC. Beloved wife of the late Samuel. Cherished mother of Cookie Spancer and Martin (Lina) Reiss. Dear sister of Daniel Gelles. Also survived by four adoring and loving grandchildren and three great - grandchildren, and many nieces and nephews. Services Wednesday 11:45am at ''The Riverside,'' 76th St & Amsterdam Ave.
